title: "check biom files"
author: "author"
date: "February 27, 2019"
output: html_document
---


```{r}
library(phyloseq)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(magrittr)

files <- list.files("test_biom/biom_downloaded")

phylo_list <- list()

for(i in 1:length(files)) {
  phylo_list[[i]] <- import_biom(paste0("test_biom/biom_downloaded/", files[i]))
}


files <- list.files("test_biom/biom_uploaded")

phylo_list <- list()

for(i in 1:length(files)) {
  phylo_list[[i]] <- import_biom(paste0("test_biom/biom_uploaded/", files[i]))
}

```
